  3/** @file    vsip/core/block_fill.hpp
  4    @author  Jules Bergmann
  5    @date    2005-02-11
  6    @brief   VSIPL++ Library: Fill block with value.
  7*/
  8
  9#ifndef VSIP_CORE_BLOCK_FILL_HPP
 10#define VSIP_CORE_BLOCK_FILL_HPP
 11
 12/***********************************************************************
 13  Included Files
 14***********************************************************************/
 15
 16#include <vsip/core/layout.hpp>
 17#include <vsip/core/block_traits.hpp>
 18#include <vsip/core/parallel/map_traits.hpp>
 19
 20
 21
 22/***********************************************************************
 23  Declarations
 24***********************************************************************/
 25
 26namespace vsip
 27{
 28
 29namespace impl
 30{
 31
 32template <dimension_type Dim,
 33	  typename       BlockT,
 34	  typename       OrderT  = typename Block_layout<BlockT>::order_type,
 35	  bool           IsGlobal = 
 36			    Is_global_only<typename BlockT::map_type>::value>
 37struct Block_fill;
 38
 39template <dimension_type Dim,
 40	  typename       BlockT,
 41	  typename       OrderT>
 42struct Block_fill<Dim, BlockT, OrderT, true>
 43{
 44  typedef typename BlockT::value_type value_type;
 45  static void exec(BlockT& block, value_type const& val)
 46  {
 47    typedef typename Distributed_local_block<BlockT>::type local_block_type;
 48    typedef typename impl::View_block_storage<local_block_type>::plain_type
 49		type;
 50
 51    if (block.map().subblock() != no_subblock)
 52    {
 53      // If get_local_block returns a temporary value, we need to copy it.
 54      // Other (if it returns a reference), this captures it.
 55      type l_block = get_local_block(block);
 56      Block_fill<Dim, local_block_type>::exec(l_block, val);
 57    }
 58  }
 59};
 60
 61template <typename BlockT,
 62	  typename OrderT>
 63struct Block_fill<1, BlockT, OrderT, false>
 64{
 65  typedef typename BlockT::value_type value_type;
 66
 67  static void exec(BlockT& block, value_type const& val)
 68  {
 69    for (index_type i=0; i<block.size(1, 0); ++i)
 70      block.put(i, val);
 71  }
 72};
 73
 74template <typename BlockT>
 75struct Block_fill<2, BlockT, row2_type, false>
 76{
 77  typedef typename BlockT::value_type value_type;
 78
 79  static void exec(BlockT& block, value_type const& val)
 80  {
 81    for (vsip::index_type r=0; r<block.size(2, 0); ++r)
 82      for (vsip::index_type c=0; c<block.size(2, 1); ++c)
 83	block.put(r, c, val);
 84  }
 85};
 86
 87template <typename BlockT>
 88struct Block_fill<2, BlockT, col2_type, false>
 89{
 90  typedef typename BlockT::value_type value_type;
 91
 92  static void exec(BlockT& block, value_type const& val)
 93  {
 94    for (vsip::index_type c=0; c<block.size(2, 1); ++c)
 95      for (vsip::index_type r=0; r<block.size(2, 0); ++r)
 96	block.put(r, c, val);
 97  }
 98};
 99
100template <typename BlockT>
101struct Block_fill<3, BlockT, tuple<0, 1, 2>, false>
102{
103  typedef typename BlockT::value_type value_type;
104
105  static void exec(BlockT& block, value_type const& val)
106  {
107    for (vsip::index_type z=0; z<block.size(3, 0); ++z)
108      for (vsip::index_type y=0; y<block.size(3, 1); ++y)
109        for (vsip::index_type x=0; x<block.size(3, 2); ++x)
110          block.put(z, y, x, val);
111  }
112};
113
114template <typename BlockT>
115struct Block_fill<3, BlockT, tuple<0, 2, 1>, false>
116{
117  typedef typename BlockT::value_type value_type;
118
119  static void exec(BlockT& block, value_type const& val)
120  {
121    for (vsip::index_type z=0; z<block.size(3, 0); ++z)
122      for (vsip::index_type x=0; x<block.size(3, 2); ++x)
123        for (vsip::index_type y=0; y<block.size(3, 1); ++y)
124          block.put(z, y, x, val);
125  }
126};
127
128template <typename BlockT>
129struct Block_fill<3, BlockT, tuple<1, 2, 0>, false>
130{
131  typedef typename BlockT::value_type value_type;
132
133  static void exec(BlockT& block, value_type const& val)
134  {
135    for (vsip::index_type y=0; y<block.size(3, 1); ++y)
136      for (vsip::index_type x=0; x<block.size(3, 2); ++x)
137        for (vsip::index_type z=0; z<block.size(3, 0); ++z)
138          block.put(z, y, x, val);
139  }
140};
141
142template <typename BlockT>
143struct Block_fill<3, BlockT, tuple<1, 0, 2>, false>
144{
145  typedef typename BlockT::value_type value_type;
146
147  static void exec(BlockT& block, value_type const& val)
148  {
149    for (vsip::index_type y=0; y<block.size(3, 1); ++y)
150      for (vsip::index_type z=0; z<block.size(3, 0); ++z)
151        for (vsip::index_type x=0; x<block.size(3, 2); ++x)
152          block.put(z, y, x, val);
153  }
154};
155
156template <typename BlockT>
157struct Block_fill<3, BlockT, tuple<2, 0, 1>, false>
158{
159  typedef typename BlockT::value_type value_type;
160
161  static void exec(BlockT& block, value_type const& val)
162  {
163    for (vsip::index_type x=0; x<block.size(3, 2); ++x)
164      for (vsip::index_type z=0; z<block.size(3, 0); ++z)
165        for (vsip::index_type y=0; y<block.size(3, 1); ++y)
166          block.put(z, y, x, val);
167  }
168};
169
170template <typename BlockT>
171struct Block_fill<3, BlockT, tuple<2, 1, 0>, false>
172{
173  typedef typename BlockT::value_type value_type;
174
175  static void exec(BlockT& block, value_type const& val)
176  {
177    for (vsip::index_type x=0; x<block.size(3, 2); ++x)
178      for (vsip::index_type y=0; y<block.size(3, 1); ++y)
179        for (vsip::index_type z=0; z<block.size(3, 0); ++z)
180          block.put(z, y, x, val);
181  }
182};
